mapper.select: SELECT L.LB_NAME,B.BK_NAME,B.BK_IMAGE,B.BK_WRITER,BK_PUBLISHER,BK_PUBLICDAY,BK_CODE,L.LB_CODE FROM BOOKS B INNER JOIN LIBRARY L ON B.BK_LCODE=L.LB_CODE WHERE ${selectval} LIKE '%'||#{bk_search}||'%'

SELECT DISTINCT B.BK_NAME,B.BK_IMAGE,B.BK_WRITER,B.BK_PUBLISHER,B.BK_PUBLICDAY,B.BK_CODE,A.BG_CATE,A.SG_CATE,B.BK_INTRODUCTION FROM BOOKS B JOIN ALLGROUP A ON B.BK_SG_NUM =A.SG_BG_NUM WHERE B.BK_CODE=#{bk_code}

SELECT L.LB_NAME,B.BK_NAME,B.BK_IMAGE,B.BK_WRITER,B.BK_PUBLISHER,B.BK_PUBLICDAY, B.BK_CODE,A.BG_CATE,A.SG_CATE,B.BK_INTRODUCTION,B.BK_QUANTITY,B.BK_BOOKLEND,L.LB_CODE,B.BK_STATE FROM BOOKS B JOIN ALLGROUP A ON B.BK_SG_NUM =A.SG_BG_NUM JOIN library L ON B.BK_LCODE=L.LB_CODE WHERE B.BK_CODE=#{bk_code} AND L.LB_CODE=#{bk_lcode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE RT_CODE=#{rv_code} AND RT_LCODE=#{rv_lcode} AND RT_ID=#{rv_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RESERVATION WHERE RT_CODE=#{rv_code} AND RT_LCODE=#{rv_lcode} AND RT_ID=#{rv_id}
DELETE FROM LIKED WHERE LK_BCODE=#{lk_bcode} AND LK_ID=#{lk_id} AND LK_LCODE=#{lk_lcode}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKED WHERE LK_BCODE=#{lk_bcode} AND LK_ID=#{lk_id} AND LK_LCODE=#{lk_lcode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM LIKED WHERE LK_BCODE=#{lk_bcode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DELIVERY WHERE DE_CODE=#{de_code} AND DE_LCODE=#{de_lcode} AND DE_ID=#{de_id}

SELECT L.LB_NAME,SUM(B.BK_QUANTITY) AS LB_QUANTITY,L.LB_CODE FROM LIBRARY L INNER JOIN BOOKS B ON B.BK_LCODE=L.LB_CODE WHERE ${selectval} LIKE '%'||#{bk_search}||'%' AND LB_LOC=#{region} GROUP BY L.LB_NAME,L.LB_CODE

SELECT B.BK_NAME,B.BK_IMAGE,B.BK_WRITER,BK_PUBLISHER,BK_PUBLICDAY,BK_CODE,SUM(BD_COUNT) AS COUNT FROM BOOKS B INNER JOIN BORROWDETAIL ON BORROWDETAIL.BD_BCODE=B.BK_CODE GROUP BY B.BK_NAME,B.BK_IMAGE,B.BK_WRITER,BK_PUBLISHER,BK_PUBLICDAY,BK_CODE,BD_BCODE ORDER BY COUNT DESC

SELECT B.BK_NAME,B.BK_IMAGE,B.BK_WRITER,BK_PUBLISHER,BK_PUBLICDAY,BK_CODE,SUM(BD_COUNT) AS COUNT FROM BOOKS B INNER JOIN BORROWDETAIL ON BORROWDETAIL.BD_BCODE=B.BK_CODE GROUP BY B.BK_NAME,B.BK_IMAGE,B.BK_WRITER,BK_PUBLISHER,BK_PUBLICDAY,BK_CODE,BD_BCODE ORDER BY COUNT DESC
SELECT NVL(AVG(RV_GRADE),0) AS AVG FROM REVIEW WHERE RV_BCODE=#{bk_code}
select count(*) as rv_count from reservation where rt_code=#{rv_code} and rt_lcode=#{rv_lcode}
SELECT R.RE_BCODE,R.RE_BNAME,R.RE_BWRITER,R.RE_PUBLISHER,R.RE_PUBLICDAY,R.RE_INTRODUCTION,R.RE_CONTENTS,R.RE_IMAGE,A.BG_CATE,A.SG_CATE FROM RECOMMAND R JOIN ALLGROUP A ON R.RE_SG_NUM =A.SG_BG_NUM
SELECT R.RE_BCODE,R.RE_BNAME,R.RE_BWRITER,R.RE_PUBLISHER,R.RE_PUBLICDAY,R.RE_INTRODUCTION,R.RE_CONTENTS,R.RE_IMAGE,A.BG_CATE,A.SG_CATE FROM RECOMMAND R JOIN ALLGROUP A ON R.RE_SG_NUM =A.SG_BG_NUM
